name: MedicalCostBurdenDiagnosesICD10CM
title: Medical Cost Burden Diagnoses ICD10CM
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: <insert metadata>

The terms in this value set represent the diagnoses associated with medical cost burden as identified by the Gravity Project),(Data Element Scope: Supports the exchange of data for the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR implementation guide as well as other uses of this SDOH terms.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes ICD-10-CM diagnoses that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

concept.display: Encounter for counseling for socioeconomic factors
Patient's noncompliance with dietary regimen due to financial hardship
Caregiver's intentional underdosing of patient's medication regimen due to financial hardship
